text.more:
3847 central figures were selected from the original dataset by their betweeness centrality (>0). 
 They are coloured according to their role: pink - artist, green - curator, blue - competition judge, orange - installer, brown - designer, red - arranger, last - preparer
 Original dataset: https://github.com/MuseumofModernArt/exhibitions#:~:text=The%20exhibition%20index%20dataset%20was,its%20registrar%20and%20curatorial%20departments. 
 Made by Maria Sysoeva
text.intro:
My network of central actors who participated in MoMA`s exhibitions during 1929-1989
Edges appear between nodes, when they participated in the same exhibition.
text.title: MoMA 1929-189 exhibitions network analysis
